availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on August 22, 1817. Graduated from the United States Military Academy in 1837. Commissioned a second lieutenant in the Second U. S. Artillery and served as that regiment's adjutant and participating in the Second Seminole War and the relocation of the Cherokee Nation. Transferred to the Adjutant General's Corps and assigned to duty in Washington, D.C. in 1846. Died May 10, 1893.

bibl.p: "Obituary, Gen. Edward D. Townsend." New York Times. May 12, 1893.
